name: faberware_measuring_spoons
description: This Farberware Measuring Spoon Set in assorted colors is a necessity for your cooking and baking needs. Come in measurements of 1/4 teaspoon 1/2 teaspoon, 1 teaspoon, 1/2 Tablespoon and 1 Tablespoon increments. Provides accurate measurements and are dishwasher safe.
